content.subject: Issue #332: mazes and crosswords, Phaser Editor, and SpaceX docking
content.body:
Weekly newsletter about HTML5 Game Development.
------------------------------------------------------------
https://mailchi.mp/62c01010df31/gamedevjsweekly332?e=971331a3b6
27ee4fc9-8cd1-4951-a082-bcb47e7673fc.png


** Issue #332 - May 15th 2020
------------------------------------------------------------

If you have anything you want to share with the HTML5 game development community please let me know by sending an email to andrzej.mazur@end3r.com (mailto:andrzej.mazur@end3r.com?subject=Gamedev.js%20Weekly) .
I'm also open for related sponsorship opportunities and job listings.


** Articles:
------------------------------------------------------------

Epic Games: Unreal Engine 5 will bring a generational change to graphics (https://gamedevjsweekly.us19.list-manage.com/track/click?u=40a827baebf8abf580f4fae15&id=3764ebdda4&e=971331a3b6)
Epic took the wraps off its Unreal Engine 5, showing in a demo video how the game engine behind Fortnite will be able to generate outstanding realistic graphics in real time.
Dean Takahashi at VentureBeat

GTA 5 is free on the Epic Games Store (https://gamedevjsweekly.us19.list-manage.com/track/click?u=40a827baebf8abf580f4fae15&id=616061379d&e=971331a3b6)
Grab it before May 21.
Fraser Brown at PC Gamer

Mojang returns to its indie roots with Minecraft Dungeons (https://gamedevjsweekly.us19.list-manage.com/track/click?u=40a827baebf8abf580f4fae15&id=53fa614c33&e=971331a3b6)
The 25-person team on turning one of the world's biggest games into a dungeon crawler for everyone.
Christopher Dring at GamesIndustryBiz

One of VRâs best games finally comes to Oculus Quest (https://gamedevjsweekly.us19.list-manage.com/track/click?u=40a827baebf8abf580f4fae15&id=6015f2b454&e=971331a3b6)
Tetris Effect is the perfect fit for Oculus Quest.
Ben Kuchera at Polygon


** Jobs:
------------------------------------------------------------

Game developers are in demand on Vettery (https://gamedevjsweekly.us19.list-manage.com/track/click?u=40a827baebf8abf580f4fae15&id=2c6ec9e643&e=971331a3b6)
Ready for a bold career move? Make a free profile, name your salary, and connect with hiring managers from top employers today.


** Tutorials:
------------------------------------------------------------

Be a-Maze-d (https://gamedevjsweekly.us19.list-manage.com/track/click?u=40a827baebf8abf580f4fae15&id=d0d217e84e&e=971331a3b6)
Join me as we write a phaser web application to generate and display a maze.
Dave Odonnel's blog

How to let players choose a character in Phaser 3 (https://gamedevjsweekly.us19.list-manage.com/track/click?u=40a827baebf8abf580f4fae15&id=cda9b921eb&e=971331a3b6)
Create different characters dynamically based on player selection.
Tommy Leung at Ourcade

Building a crossword puzzle generator with JavaScript (https://gamedevjsweekly.us19.list-manage.com/track/click?u=40a827baebf8abf580f4fae15&id=1f166c8750&e=971331a3b6)
This will be the most complex code Iâve introduced to date.
Mitchum's blog


** Tools:
------------------------------------------------------------

Phaser Editor 2D v3 released (https://gamedevjsweekly.us19.list-manage.com/track/click?u=40a827baebf8abf580f4fae15&id=94137f5219&e=971331a3b6)

Kite launches AI-powered JavaScript completions (https://gamedevjsweekly.us19.list-manage.com/track/click?u=40a827baebf8abf580f4fae15&id=3df5d5cc29&e=971331a3b6)


** Resources:
------------------------------------------------------------

Zork - source code of a 1977 version (https://gamedevjsweekly.us19.list-manage.com/track/click?u=40a827baebf8abf580f4fae15&id=c00224ae61&e=971331a3b6)


** Demos:
------------------------------------------------------------

SpaceX ISS docking simulator (https://gamedevjsweekly.us19.list-manage.com/track/click?u=40a827baebf8abf580f4fae15&id=36baca7221&e=971331a3b6)


** Videos:
------------------------------------------------------------

Playing games on a 60s computer (https://gamedevjsweekly.us19.list-manage.com/track/click?u=40a827baebf8abf580f4fae15&id=68b789df09&e=971331a3b6)

Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1 and 2 remaster trailer (https://gamedevjsweekly.us19.list-manage.com/track/click?u=40a827baebf8abf580f4fae15&id=147e2efcbc&e=971331a3b6)


** Games:
------------------------------------------------------------

ZOOM-BE (https://gamedevjsweekly.us19.list-manage.com/track/click?u=40a827baebf8abf580f4fae15&id=6588e70172&e=971331a3b6)

============================================================
** follow on Twitter (https://gamedevjsweekly.us19.list-manage.com/track/click?u=40a827baebf8abf580f4fae15&id=ab11371703&e=971331a3b6)
| ** like on Facebook (https://gamedevjsweekly.us19.list-manage.com/track/click?u=40a827baebf8abf580f4fae15&id=9d95f740c0&e=971331a3b6)
| ** forward to a friend (http://us19.forward-to-friend.com/forward?u=40a827baebf8abf580f4fae15&id=2c3fca4d1f&e=971331a3b6)
